error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Object'. Did you mean 'object'?

==== es6ModuleFunctionDeclaration.ts (0 errors) ====
    export function foo() {
    }
    function foo2() {
    }
    foo();
    foo2();
    
    export module m1 {
        export function foo3() {
        }
        function foo4() {
        }
        foo();
        foo2();
        foo3();
        foo4();
    }
    module m2 {
        export function foo3() {
        }
        function foo4() {
        }
        foo();
        foo2();
        foo3();
        foo4();
        m1.foo3();
    }
